Name:
USS MacKenzie
HMCS Annapolis
Namesake:
Alexander Slidell MacKenzie
Annapolis River of Nova Scotia
Builder: Union Iron Works, San Francisco, California
Fate:
Transferred to Canada, 24 September 1940
Sold for scrapping, 4 June 1945
Propulsion:
27,000 shp (20,000 kW) 
two shaft geared turbines
Armament:
4 x single 4 in (102 mm)/50 cal guns 
1 x 3 in (76 mm) AA gun
3 x 12.7mm  machine guns
12 x 21 in (533 mm) torpedo tubes (4x3)
